column-selection-1624:306.description: Select the column containing measured, non redundant list of m/z values

string-input-1624:1527.description: Absolute path to the Python3 executable; do not change unless you want to use your own python environment outside the KNIME_docker_vnc container

string-input-1624:320.description: M/z range to be covered by the DIA windows (e.g. 400-1000) or percentile based on the provided m/z values (e.g. 0.9); percentile value is used to leave out the same number of observations (5% of the values in case of percentile 0.9) from both ends to define the target m/z range

int-input-1624:859.description: Number of DIA windows to make; please note that in case of overlapping DIA windows, the number of actually generated windows will be the specified number x2 +1

single-selection-1624:319.description: Specify what DIA windows design you would like to get
